be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.model

Interface DALServices

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DALServiceMock, DALServicesImpl

    public interface DALServices
    This interface is part of the DAL (Data Access Layer). It is exposed to the UCCs (Use-case Controllers) to manage the connections to the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commit()
      Commits all operations performed on the database and closes the connection.
      void createTables() 
      void createTables(java.lang.String name)
      This method creates all the necessary tables if they don't exist
      void deleteDB(java.lang.String name)
      This method delete the database Usefull for tests
      void rollback()
      Rolls back all operations performed on the database and closes the connection.
      void startTransaction()
      Opens a connection and starts a transaction.
